name: FNF Sonic EXE Test
description:
FNF Sonic EXE Test

Many of you told me to make a Sonic.exe character test game... so, I made one! In this FNF Test game, you can test 4 different appearances, phases, stages, evolutions, or how you want to call them.

PLEASE HAVE PATIENCE AND WAIT FOR THE GAME TO LOAD!

What character variation you will find in Friday Night Funkin: Sonic.exe Mod and Test game?

  1. Sonic.EXE with Too Slow
  2. Majin Sonic with Endless
  3. Lord X with Execution
  4. Sunky.MPEG with Milk
Download or play online

Like all of my games, you can play it online here at my friends Play-Games.Com, or, you can download it for Linux, Mac, and Windows.

Please don't forget to rate it.

Credits like always:

  • Composer: MarStarBro, Vania, Uptaunt
